about_the_game: Expand the power and versatility of Phoenix Point operatives with cybernetic augmentations. Unlock new abilities for your soldiers, new research projects, and new approaches to tactical combat. But beware: enemies will bring cybernetics to bear against your team, too.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 10, 8 and 7 SP1+ (64 bit)

  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 / AMD Radeon R9 270x

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 10, 8 and 7 SP1+ (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3GHz / AMD Ryzen 3 3.1 GHz or better
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible
